content: "{\"object\":\"value\",\"document\":{\"object\":\"document\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"OpenDNS\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" \",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{}}},{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"is a service, which helps extend phishing protection and optional content filtering across EPAM network. It is not possible to use non-epam DNS in office network – appropriate ports are closed. It means that it's not possible to use any external DNS services (e.g. Google resolvers 8.8.8.8 etc.), except EPAM ones. In the meantime, it does not apply to the VPN connection (e.g. Customers networks). EPAM DNS server redirects all DNS requests to Open DNS server, which filters them and either allows access to the resource, or not.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Study information about processing requests related to unavailability of external resources in article “\",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://kb.epam.com/x/onquFg\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Site Blocking and Internet Content Filtering\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"”.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\n\\n\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}}"
